oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: The New Digital Bleek and Lloyd Archive
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: !nanni (XI)
Tamme (XII)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: !nanni and Tamme (at Mowbray) contribute words and sentences relating to everyday life in their country. Some words have been given in Herero, but there are also references to other groups of people in the area, such as the Ovaherero and the Makoba (and what they call things). 1) This story is found in Book XI & XII-1.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd !kun notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Words and sentences: given by !nanni and Tamme in Mowbray
